title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-11.5 - Automatic-maximum firing rate over 16 to 33 gallons per hour
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-11.5 - Automatic-maximum firing rate over 16 to 33 gallons per hour

State Regulations

The main flame trial-for-ignition period shall not exceed
15 seconds and the main flame shall be continually supervised while the burner
is firing. Upon flame failure, the main oil valve shall close automatically
within 15 seconds if the burner does not relight within this
time. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
4-11.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
